class.name: CellMaterialND
class.brief_description: Cell material for ND cell meshes.
class.description: CellMaterialND is a material for ND cell meshes. It provides a user-friendly way to color cell meshes using single colors, per-vertex colors, per-cell colors, per-cell UVW coordinates, or ND texture colors. CellMaterialND can be set on a [CellMeshND] resource to define how the cell mesh should be colored, and/or overridden on a specific [MeshInstanceND] node.

members.member: The single albedo color of the material. When the albedo source is set to [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_SINGLE_COLOR], this is the color of the entire cell mesh. If the albedo source is set to [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_VERT_AND_SINGLE], [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_CELL_AND_SINGLE], [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_CELL_UVW_AND_SINGLE], or [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_TEXTUREND_AND_SINGLE], this color is multiplied with the per-vertex, per-cell, per-cell UVW, or ND texture colors, respectively.

The albedo color array of the material. This may be used to color various parts of the mesh, depending on the albedo source flags. Only used when any of the per-item color flags are set, meaning the [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_VERT_ONLY], [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_CELL_ONLY], [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_VERT_AND_SINGLE], and [constant CELL_COLOR_SOURCE_PER_CELL_AND_SINGLE] cell color sources.

The albedo source of the material, an enum specific to cell meshes. Can be a single color, per-vertex, per-cell, per-cell UVW coordinates, ND texture, or a combination of single color and the other color sources.

constants.constant: Indicates the color source is a single color for the entire cell mesh.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a vertex.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a cell.
Indicates the color source is a texture map where each cell is mapped to a texture coordinate.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a vertex, modulated by a single color.
Indicates the color source is the color array where each item is used for a cell, modulated by a single color.
Indicates the color source is a texture map where each cell is mapped to a texture coordinate, modulated by a single color.
